name: PatchEmployeeSelfServiceAccessByEmployerId
description:
__Activity name :__ PatchEmployeeSelfServiceAccessByEmployerId

This endpoint allows the user to change the status of access to ESS for several employees of the employer.

Authorization.description: A valid Bearer token for authorizing the request.

Accept.description: The accept header is used to influence what type of output is returned and in most cases the version of the output

$ul: **version**
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
**messages**
**content**
**collectiveActionId**: The unique identifier of an object (GUID/UUID)
**itemCount**: Summary of the items in the collective action.
**processed**: The number of items in the collectiveAction that were processed succesfully without a warning.
**processedWithError**: The number of items in the collectiveAction that were processed unsuccesfully and resulted in an error.
**processedWithWarning**: The number of items in the collectiveAction that were processed succesfully with a warning.
**total**: The total number of items in the collectiveAction.
**status**: status of the collectiveAction
**submittedByUserId**: The unique identifier of an object (GUID/UUID)
**submittedOn**: Date-time when the collectiveAction was submitted.
**type**: the type of collectiveAction
